A

actualDamage - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Contains the damage received from an attack, can be a negative value (healing).
Attack - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This abstract class represents an Attack a that character generates and contains a damage score.
Attack() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
This constructor sets the damage to zero (i.e.
Attack(int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
This constructor sets the value specified into the damage field, no data validation is performed.
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
This method generates an Attack from this character, it uses strength + (1 to 8 inclusive) for the damage calculation.
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
This method overrides the attack() method from the Character class It creates an attack from the Mutant Eagle An attack damage amount myDamage represents the damage dealt by the Mutant Eagle Two attacks are instantiated: a Fire attack and a Basic attack If attackChance is less than or equal to 75, a Basic attack is rendered Else, a Fire attack is rendered
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
This method overrides the attack() method from the Character class It creates an attack from the Sea Monster An attack damage amount myDamage represents the damage dealt by the SeaMonster Two attacks are instantiated: a Frost attack and a Basic attack If attackChance is less than or equal to 50, a Basic attack is rendered else, a Frost attack is rendered
attackChance - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
 
attackChance - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
 
AttackReport - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class contains two pieces of information, the first is a text-based description of how a character defended against an attack, the second is the actualDamage the character received, note that actualDamage could have a negative value indicating healing.
AttackReport() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the report to "no report" and the actual damage to zero (i.e.
AttackReport(String, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the report and actualDamage to the respective fields.
